description:
Several laptops and Chromebooks are discounted as part of Target's big Circle Week sale, which runs until April 13. While the discounted models aren't strong enough to play most games, these are still great deals if you need a new laptop for work or school. The discounts are available to Target Circle members, which you can join for free. All the discounted laptops also qualify for free shipping during the Circle Week event.

Shop Target Circle Week Sale

One such model is the HP 15.6-inch Touchscreen Laptop, which is available in two version
title: Laptops And Chromebooks Are Super Cheap During Target's Circle Week Sale

description: Apple AirTag
title: Apple AirTag 4-Pack Gets Nice Price Cut At Amazon

description:
A selection of first-party Nintendo Switch games are on sale for $40 each at Amazon. Switch games don't go on sale very often, and since most are discounted by up to 33%, this is a perfect chance to grab brand-new boxed copies of some great Nintendo games.

The newest games in Amazon's sale are Splatoon 3 and Kirby and the Forgotten Land, both of which were some of the best games of 2022. The rest of the deals are for older Switch releases, including The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild. While the game may have been eclipsed by its sequel, Tears of the Kingdom, in some respects, Breath of the Wild is sti
title: Grab First-Party Nintendo Switch Games For Cheap At Amazon

description:
The latest incarnation of Target Circle Week might just be the best yet when it comes to gaming and tech products. Gaming accessories, including plenty of great controllers, are on sale for some of the lowest prices we've ever seen; TVs and laptops are up for grabs for cheap; and a slew of toys and electronic games, like the Arcade1Up Infinity Game Board, have received rare, meaningful discounts. We've rounded up the best Target Circle Week deals.

Note that this sale only runs through this Saturday, April 13. The deals are exclusive to Target Circle members, but signing up for the rewards program is entirely
title: Best Target Circle Week Deals: Gaming And Tech Products On Sale For Incredible Prices

description: Berserk is one of the greatest manga of all time, and Dark Horse has shown the series the reverence it deserves by collecting the first 42 volumes in gorgeous hardcover deluxe editions that are both practical and stunning display pieces for your shelf. The 14 deluxe editions contain Kentaro Miura's entire run helming the stunning tale of swords, sorcery, and defying fate. Miura, the creator of Berserk, sadly passed away in 2021, but he left a mark on the world of manga and anime that will remain for many years to come. Over at Amazon, you can save big on Berserk deluxe editions. Even better? Half of the series is eligible for Amazon's buy two, get one free sale that's running concurrently with
title: Select Berserk Manga Deluxe Editions Are B2G1 Free At Amazon This Week

description: In a battery race, the official Xbox Wireless Controller easily trumps most of its competition. Still, there's a good chance that your controller has run out of juice at the worst possible time, but fortunately, Target Circle Week is here and there are several deals on right now for spare batteries. These discounts will automatically be applied if you're logged into your Circle account, and membership is free for this program. There's also some hard-to-beat deals on Xbox wireless controllers at Target right now, so if you want to double up on hardware and batteries, this is a good t
title: Controller Charger Deals - Official Xbox Play And Charge Kit, Energizer Batteries For Cheap, And More

description: With Target Circle Week in full swing, a bunch of Lego sets are now on sale for 30% off, so it's a good time to stock up on a few boxes for those rainy days when you're looking for a fun activity. One of the standout deals right now is this Target-exclusive set, the Lego Disney Villain Icons kit that was released to celebrate Disney's 100th anniversary. A charming piece of nostalgia, this set has been discounted from $130 to $91 for Target Circle members.
title: Target-Exclusive Lego Disney Villains Set Is One Of Many Great Circle Week Lego Deals

description: The Hori Split Pad Compact is on sale for its lowest price ever as part of Target's Circle Week sale. At just $26, you're saving close to 50% off the Nintendo Switch controller's $50 list price. To take advantage of this deal, you need to sign up for a free Target Circle membership. Only the light gray and yellow model of the Split Pad Compact is up for grabs at this price, though you can get several other Split Pad models at discounted prices from other major retailers, including Amazon.
title: Hori Split Pad Compact Switch Controller Is 50% Off For Target Circle Week

description:
The third season of Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 adds three new DLC weapons in the battle pass and makes weapon-balancing changes, meaning you'll likely want to adjust your loadouts for this new season. Here we recommend some of the best weapon builds for your next match of multiplayer, and you can find recommended Warzone loadouts for Season 3 here.



SVA 545

The SVA 545 is one of the most powerful assault rifles
title: Call Of Duty: MW3 Best Weapon Loadouts For MP Season 3

description: The Season 3 update for Call of Duty: Warzone added a new submachine gun and a powerful new sniper to unlock. There were also some weapon-balancing changes, meaning you'll want to consider adjusting your loadouts from last season. Here we recommend various weapon loadouts you can try for your next match of battle royale, and you can find recommended MW3 multiplayer loadouts for Season 3 here.
title: Call Of Duty: Warzone Best Weapon Loadouts For MW3 Season 3

description:
More than two years after its release, Elden Ring fans will finally be returning to the Lands Between later this year. Shadow of the Erdtree is a massive expansion for From Software's open-world fantasy-RPG and is set to take place in a whole new area. It also looks to expand on the base game by centering on Miquella, a character who was important in Elden Ring but whose story was left untold by the end.

With a new trailer and interviews providing details about what we can expect, we've finally moved out of the realm of speculation to concrete facts about Shadow of the Erdtree--although, there's still a lot players are guessing at. Here's everything you need to know about Elden Ring's story expansion, from when it releases, to what it will include.

Table of Contents
title: Elden Ring Shadow Of The Erdtree Bosses, Gameplay, And Everything We Know

description:
Netflix has become just the latest media and technology giant to announce layoffs. Deadline reports that a "major restructure" is underway within Netflix, and that 15 people from the company's film division are being let go.

This reported restructuring comes not long after Dan Lin became the new head of Netflix's film division, taking over for Scott Stuber, who left to start his own company.

As part of the new organizational shift, Netflix's movie division will be broken down into genre, with bosses for each major unit. Ori Marmur will lead action, fantasy, horror, and sci-fi; Kira Goldberg is heading up thrillers, drama, and family films; Niija Kuykendall is taking the lead on young adult, holiday, and faith-based movies; and Jason Young is running the comedy and rom-com team within Netflix. These changes have been in the works for the past month, Deadline reported.
title: Netflix Announces Layoffs And Restructuring

description:
After a weekend of intense fighting, Helldivers 2 players have successfully driven the Automaton threat out of the galaxy. The conclusion to Operation Swift Disassembly has seen an entire faction removed from the game, as the Automatons are nowhere to be found after players liberated the planets of Maia, Durgen, and Tibit. The murder-bots didn't go quietly into the night as their foundries unleashed new mobile weapons of mass destruction, although Helldivers got a major firepower boost when the Quasar Cannon and heavy machine gun weapons were added to the game.

Durgen was the last to fall, seemingly bringing an end to the mechanical threat for good. "You did it, Helldivers,"
title: Helldivers 2 Players Have Successfully Kicked An Entire Enemy Faction Out Of The Game

description:
Get ready to (water)bend it like Katara and other members of the Aang gang in Fortnite. The enormously popular game will add a trio of Avatar: The Last Airbender skins to the game tomorrow, April 9--in addition to a special Avatar: Elements event beginning April 12.

Korra, Zuko, and Toph will be available for purchase in the item shop starting tomorrow, according to the official Fortnite account on X (formerly known as Twitter). The teaser clip for their inclusion shows each character bending their own element: Katara with water, Toph with earth, and Zuko with fire. Aang is also shown encased in ice before being broken out by Katara. The Avatar will probably be part of the Avatar: Elements mini battle pass.

Yip yip! Get ready, Avatar: The Last Airbender is coming to Fortnite.
Katara, Zuko, and Toph land in the
title: Fortnite Getting Avatar: The Last Airbender Event This Week, Along With New Skins

description:
The developer behind Baldur's Gate 3, Larian Studios, is probably betting on early access again for its next project. In an interview with Stephen Totilo for Game File, head of publishing Michael Douse said the model is key to creating a situation where developers have a constant dialogue with players.

"I think, you know, our next--whatever the next thing will be--will also probably be in early access," Douse said. "That way you remove a lot of the prediction, too. When you release a game in AAA, whatever method, [if] you don't have early access, you're taking a huge bet on the fact that this is good and people like it. In early access, you find out very quickly. It helps you steer the massive ship."

The interviewee advocated for early access as the only way to create social resonance now. In terms of creating a strong core game
title: Baldur's Gate 3 Studio's Next Game Will Likely Launch In Early Access Too

description:
Actress Daisy Ridley is returning to the Star Wars universe to reprise her fan-favorite character, Rey, and now she's spoken a little more about coming back to the sci-fi franchise. In particular, she acknowledged that Star Wars has its fair share of critics, but she wanted to come back for another film because of the potential to make people happy.

Speaking to Empire, Ridley says she feels like she's "owning it" more these days than when she made her first Star Wars movie, 2015's The Force Awakens. "Basically, I'm an adult now," she said. "I certainly did not feel like an adult at the time. Obviously, personally, things have changed, and professionally, I've had lots of other experiences, and so I definitely feel like it's a different thing this time."

Ridley previously discussed how she
title: Daisy Ridley Believes Star Wars Is "Divisive" But Also Brings "Love And Joy" To People

description:
If you've ever wanted to indulge in Cygames' latest action-RPG, then you might want to check out its limited-time Amazon offer on Granblue Fantasy: Relink. The Deluxe version for the PlayStation 5 is currently on sale for $65. Amazon account members may also get an extra 5-10% off if a coupon box appears on the page.

See at Amazon

In addition to the Granblue Fantasy: Relink game, the Deluxe Edition includes an artbook with over 100 pages, a CD soundtrack with 12 tracks, a set of five postcards, and in-game DLC. The DLC features a Starter Item Pack with usable items to help you on your journey, cosmetics in the form of Character Color Packs 1-3, and the weapon "False Sword of the Apocalypse." These are by no means necessary for completing your quest across the Sky Realm, but they can lighten the load and give you more looks to experiment with. However, if
title: Grab Granblue Fantasy: Relink Deluxe Edition For $65

description:
Ermac is set to make his Mortal Kombat 1 debut, as NetherRealm Studios has announced the first gameplay trailer for the telepathic ninja is coming this week. In the leadup to the reveal, series creator Ed Boon has shared details on how the character was born, which includes a simple misunderstanding of an abbreviation.

Boon begins by elaborating on Ermac's name, which is an abbreviation of "Error Macro," or a log of every error in the code while an arcade machine was in use. The "Ermacs" counter was listed alongside the number of times players encountered Reptile on the machine, which led some to believe "Ermac" was a similarly secret opponent.

30+ years ago we were working on the very first #MortalKombat game. The game's software, had sections of code that it (theoretically) should never reach/execute.
title: Mortal Kombat Creator Explains How Error Message Spawned A New Character

description:
The Associated Press has reported that actor Jonathan Majors has been ordered to complete a year-long counseling program but avoided jail time Monday for assaulting his ex-girlfriend. The actor had faced up to a year behind bars after he was convicted of misdemeanor assault by a Manhattan jury back in December.

This started last March when Jabbari accused Majors of attacking her in the backseat of a chauffeured car, saying he hit her head with his open hand, twisted her arm behind her back, and squeezed her middle finger until it fractured.

On Monday, Judge Michael Gaffey sentenced Majors to a conditional discharge after noting that both sides agreed the charges did not warrant jail time, given the
title: Jonathan Majors Won't Get Jail Time In Assault Sentencing

description:
As North America prepares to experience a total solar eclipse today, Call of Duty is joining the celebration by adding an eclipse to Warzone's Rebirth Island map.

Matches of Resurgence on Rebirth Island start out with normal sunny skies, but the atmosphere gradually shifts near the first circle until the map takes on a dark and eerie vibe, which is all thanks to an in-game solar eclipse.

Rebirth island Solar eclipse event happening rn pic.twitter.com/iDj5f3RYlj

— SoaR Meishū (@ImMeishu) April 8, 2024
title: CoD: Warzone Lets You Experience The Solar Eclipse On Rebirth Island

description:
Sonic co-creator and Balan Wonderworld director Yuji Naka has broken his social media silence to speak about Dragon Quest producer Yu Miyake.

Last week, Square Enix top producer Yu Miyake was reportedly stepping down due to multiple internal delays of Dragon Quest XII. Naka took to Twitter to accuse Miyake of lying during Naka's own insider trading trial.

In a tweet (machine translated), Naka claims that Miyake lied in court documents and hopes that he'll be gone from Square Enix soon. Along with the accusations, Naka seems to praise Square Enix's new president Takashi Kiryu, even though they never met, who is shaking up the company's development process to focus on fewer and higher-quality games.
title: Sonic Co-Creator Returns To Social Media To Point Finger At Dragon Quest Producer

description: The official Xbox Series X|S Wireless Gaming Headset is discounted to $72 at Amazon and Target. The deal originated at Target thanks to the retailer's Circle Week sale, which you have to sign up for a free Target Circle account to shop. But like usual, Amazon is matching some of Target's best deals, including this Xbox headset offer. At Amazon, you need to click the coupon box to slash an additional $18 off the price and get it down to $72. This wire
title: Official Xbox Wireless Headset Is Steeply Discounted At Amazon

description: Are you ready to venture into the wild Wasteland? Fallout fans everywhere are looking forward to the new Fallout series from Amazon Prime, but if you’re unfamiliar with this particular post-apocalypse—or just want a refresher before the premiere—we’ve got you covered.
title: The Lore Of Fallout Explained

description: The Victrix Pro BFG is the most versatile controller available for PS5. If you're interested in trying a pro-style gamepad with all the bells and whistles, the Pro BFG is definitely worth considering. That's especially the case this week, as Target is selling the Pro BFG for $144 (was $180) as part of the retailer's Circle Week sale. To take advantage of this offer, you simply need to sign up for a free Target Circle rewards account. The Pro BFG offers wireless and wired connectivities on PS5, PS4, and PC.
title: This Modular PS5 Controller Is On Sale For Its Lowest Price Yet

description:
Yet another Prince of Persia game is reportedly coming this year, not long after January saw the release of Prince of Persia: The Lost Crown.

According to an update from Insider Gaming, the new Prince of Persia game is reportedly set to be revealed on April 10 and releasing on May 14 into Steam Early Access. This new Prince of Persia game is reportedly a roguelite title that's been in development by Dead Cells studio Evil Empire for the past four years. The art style is apparently inspired by Franco-Belgian comics too.

The reported reveal date lines up with the Triple I Initiative showcase that's set to air on April 10, and Evil Empire has con
title: Another New Prince Of Persia Game Is Reportedly On Its Way Next Month

description:
Yet another Prince of Persia game is reportedly coming this year, not long after January saw the release of Prince of Persia: The Lost Crown.

According to an update from Insider Gaming, the new Prince of Persia game is reportedly set to be revealed on April 10 and releasing on May 14 into Steam Early Access. This new Prince of Persia game is reportedly a roguelite title that's been in development by Dead Cells studio Evil Empire for the past four years. The art style is apparently inspired by Franco-Belgian comics too.

The reported reveal date lines up with the Triple I Initiative showcase that's set to air on April 10, and Evil Empire has con
title: Another New Prince Of Persia Is Reportedly On Its Way Next Month

description:
As part of a new partnership, Chipotle and Bandai Namco have created a Tekken-inspired burrito bowl, and the ingredients were voted on by fans of the fighting game series.

The Tekken 8 Battle Bowl, as it's called, is available to order through the Chipotle app and Chipotle.com right now. After calling on fans to submit their preferences for ingredients, more than 380,000 people weighed in to decide how it should taste. Here's what Tekken fans came up with for the Tekken 8 Battle Bowl:

  • Chicken, White Rice, Black Beans, Fresh Tomato Salsa, Roasted Chili-Corn Salsa, Fajita Veggies, Cheese, and Guac.

Additionally, Chipotle announced that people who order the Tekken 8 Battle Bowl or something else via the Chipotle app or website and use the code EWGF623 will earn in-game currency for Tekken 8. The code is a nod to the "Electric Wind God Fist" move.
title: Gamers Voted On Chipotle's Next Burrito Bowl, And Here Are The Ingredients

description: If you're just starting out with PC gaming or you want to buy some new hardware for a younger gamer in the family, this Target Circle Week deal offers a good discount on a starter bundle. This HyperX gaming bundle offers a solid keyboard, lightweight mouse, headset, and a mouse pad, all for $104 if you have a free Circle membership.
title: Get A HyperX Gaming Keyboard, Mouse, And Headset For Only $100 This Week

description:
It's a historic day: one that has united the world in a shared goal of understanding and spirituality. We are of course talking about Rex Manning Day, and while we're loathe to disrupt any interruptions of Say No More, Mon Amour, we're also kind of excited for today's solar eclipse. By the time you're reading this, the cosmic event might be over, but at least it lives on through memes.

We've seen some great jokes online this year and we're compiling them below, ranging from the obligatory Simpsons reference featuring Leonard Nimoy to some terrific gaming references that most of us had forgotten about. Fortunately, some people have a very long memory!

Jokes aside, this total solar eclipse is a legitimately special one as it's the first to pass through the US in seven years. According to NASA, we won't be seeing a
title: The Best Gaming Eclipse Memes Until We Do This Again In 2044

description:
Before you let's-a go on your flight, Nintendo is offering people a chance to play Switch games at John F. Kennedy International Airport in New York City. The company built a special pop-up space that will be available for travelers to check out from now to April 20.

In fact, the event--called Nintendo Switch On the Go--even featured Mario himself over the weekend. The overall-wearing hero walked around JetBlue's Terminal 5 at one of the world's biggest airports to meet fans and take pictures.
title: Nintendo Brings Switch And Mario Himself To One Of World's Biggest Airports

description:
Director James Mangold's Star Wars: Dawn of the Jedi is one step closer to happening. Via The Hollywood Reporter, Beau Willimon has signed on to co-write the script for Dawn of the Jedi, which will explore the origins of the Force and the Jedi 25,000 years before the original Star Wars movies.

Willimon is no stranger to Star Wars, thanks to his stint on Andor Season 1, including the acclaimed 10th episode of the season, One Way Out. Willimon's previous credits include Netflix's House of Cards as well as The Ides of March and Mary Queen of Scots.

Dawn of the Jedi, which is still technically the working title of the film, was announced at Star Wars Celebration London in April 2023. During that event, Mangold compared it to Hollywood's classic biblical epics.
title: Star Wars: Dawn Of The Jedi Gets New Screenwriter To Work With Logan Director

description: Buying a go-kart for a few rounds of real-life Mario Kart would be fairly expensive, but the next best thing is a racing wheel that'll add an extra layer of immersion to your Mushroom Kingdom races in Mario Kart 8 Deluxe. With Target Circle Week now live through April 13, you can pick up a few of these racing wheels at very affordable prices from several top brands. To get these deals you'll need to be a member of the Target Circle club, but signing up is free and easy. If you need the game as well, you can
title: Target Circle Week - Save Big On Mario Kart Racing Wheels For Nintendo Switch

description:
Following his first-ever Oscar win for Oppenheimer, many are wondering what roles Robert Downey Jr. might take on next. Some might have assumed he was finished with Marvel after his long and successful run as Iron Man that culminated in the character's death in Avengers: Endgame. But Downey Jr. has now said he's open to the idea of coming back to Marvel.

Speaking to Esquire, Downey Jr. said he would "happily" come back for another Marvel role one day. "It's too integral a part of my DNA. That role chose me. And look, I always say, 'Never, ever bet against [Marvel president] Kevin Feige.' It is a losing bet. He's the house. He will always win," he said.

Downey Jr. was not an easy sell to Marvel's management when he was originally cast as Iron Man back in the mi
title: Robert Downey. Jr Would "Happily" Work With Marvel Again

description:
Microsoft probably likes the inspirational quote, "Sometimes you have to take a step back to move forward." That's because Xbox has created a new team that will spearhead game preservation for the company now and into the future.

Windows Central reported that President of Xbox Sarah Bond sent out an email to her team announcing the new group. "We have formed a new team dedicated to game preservation, important to all of us at Xbox and the industry itself," wrote Bond. "We are building on our strong history of delivering backwards compatibility to our players, and we remain committed to bringing forward the amazing library of Xbox games for future generations of players to enjoy."

According to Windows Central, Microsoft confirmed the authenticity of Bond's email. In additi
title: Xbox Has Put Together A New Team Focused On Game Preservation

description:
The next big video game adaptation for TV is Fallout, and it's here this week on Prime Video. One of the executive producers and directors, Jonathan Nolan, has now discussed how the show is similar to the Batman films, which Nolan also worked on with his brother Christopher.

The Fallout games are known for being open-ended and non-linear, so what Nolan could do with the Fallout series is craft his own original story inside the wider Fallout universe. That's similar to what he and his brother did with the Batman series, he said on the Happy Sad Confused podcast.

"While there is canon here, there is no canonical version of each of the games. They're different for everyone who played them," he said. "Here you have this beautiful world with all this incredible work. You're standing on the shoulders, as we were with Batman--and in a weird way, we wound up in a similar place to Batman. There were so many different vers
title: How Fallout TV Show Is Like Batman Movies, According To Jonathan Nolan

description: Tobias Capwell is an independent scholar, curator, an expert on arms and armor, as well as a historical advisor for movies and TV. But how realistic is Dragon's Dogma 2's weapons and armour? What does an expert think of the arsenal's of The Arisen and their Pawns? And what is the best tool for dragon slaying?
title: Armor Expert Reacts to Dragon's Dogma 2's Arms & Armor

description:
Over a dozen official Xbox Wireless Controllers are on sale at Target during Circle Week, including the Xbox Adaptive Controller. Normally $100, the brilliant Xbox Adaptive Controller is on sale for $80 through April 13. This deal is only available to Target Circle members, but it's free to sign up for the rewards reprogram. Deals on the Xbox Adaptive Controller are exceedingly rare.

See at Target
title: Xbox Adaptive Controller Gets Big Price Cut At Target For Circle Week

description:
Prime Video's Fallout TV series hasn't even debuted yet, but a second season is said to be in the works. The California Film Commission has announced its latest tax-incentive disbursements, and included in the list is $25 million in tax credits for Fallout Season 2.

Season 1 was primarily produced in New York, Utah, New Jersey, and Namibia, but Season 2 could be headed to California in part due to the tax breaks. Or it might not. As Variety reminds us, a show being allocated tax credits to film in California doesn't guarantee that will happen.

As an example, Amazon was given a $25 million tax break to film Season 2 of Citadel in California, but the show eventually exited the tax-break program and will go a
title: Fallout Season 2 Looks Likely

description: Board games are great, but what isn't fun is finding space to store all of them. Fortunately, the Arcade 1Up Infinity Game Board is a solution to that problem, because this device crams dozens of classic board games into a hi-tech frame. It's very rarely on sale, but for Target Circle Week, you can score a nice $100 discount on the Game Board, while its larger sibling, the Infinity Game Table, has been discounted by $200. As a reminder, you'll need to be a member of Target's Circle Club to get these deals,
title: Arcade1Up Infinity Game Board Gets Rare Discount

description:
Chewbacca actor Joonas Suotamo has discussed his role in the upcoming Star Wars TV series The Acolyte, in which he plays a Jedi Wookie named Kelnacca. Speaking to Empire, Suotamo said it was a "dream come true" to step into a role he's been dreaming about since childhood.

"Ever since [I was] five years old, I've been fantasizing about being a Jedi, like every kid," he said. "When the word Jedi was first mentioned [in talks for The Acolyte], I felt really excited--like a little kid who finally gets his favorite toy on his birthday."

Suotamo took over as Chewbacca from Peter Mayhew, who passed away in 2019. Suotamo said he learned from Mayhew that Chewbacca is meant to be played as a mime character, in that the
title: Chewbacca Actor Talks About Playing A Jedi Wookie In The Acolyte

description: Target Circle Week is here--and while it's not quite as exciting as Prime Day, there are tons of great deals to peruse especially if you're in the market for a new Xbox controller. The official Xbox Wireless Controller is not only the best controller for Xbox, it's also one of the best PC controllers you can buy. It's a versatile piece of hardware that offers excellent performance and ergonomics. At Target, various versions and special editions of the controller are on sale, so if the standard Carbon Black or
title: Official Xbox Wireless Controllers Are Cheaper Than Black Friday Prices For Target Circle Week

description:
A running theory about Grand Theft Auto VI is that Troy Baker, one of the most popular and best-known voice actors in gaming, is voicing the male lead in the open-world game. Baker himself has now responded to that theory, telling The Movie Dweeb that he counts it as a compliment that people think it's him, but it's not.

"I want that guy, whoever it is, to get credit for his work, because I'm sure it's going to be great. That's a grind. Those guys pour themselves into those characters and they deserve all of the credit for their work," Baker said of people who do voicework for Rocksta
title: GTA 6: A Key Theory Has Been Debunked

description:
There are so many unfinished stories in the Marvel Cinematic Universe that it was genuinely a surprise when the Loki Season 2 finale seemingly brought the story of Tom Hiddleston's God of Mischief to a meaningful conclusion. To protect his friends and save the multiverse, Loki completed his evolution into the God of Stories and became the protector of the infinite timelines at the End of Time. During a recent interview with Variety, Hiddleston was asked if he would return for Loki Season 3. And while Hiddleston couldn't answer that question, he confirmed that he's happy with the way Loki's 12-year character arc ended.

“I truthfully don’t know [about Season 3], said Hiddleston. “I am so proud of where we landed in Season 2. To go from this lost, broken soul in Asgard, and be given a second chance and learn so much about life that he actually gives himself to protect other p
title: Tom Hiddleston Looks Back On Loki's Season 2 Finale

description:
We've heard of lofi beats for relaxation or focus, but usually they serve as the background for gaming and other activities. Mooncube Games is attempting to switch up the formula with Spirit City: Lofi Sessions, a game that lets you control all parts of the lofi experience, and it launches today on PC.

Spirit City gives you the opportunity to customize your own Lofi Girl or Boy, with options including both the look of the character and the background of their relaxation session. The game will then provide a curated list of lofi tracks to create a specially crafted lofi session based on what you have created.

You can also create and customize a small spirit companion from a selection found throughout the world. Certain spirits can be coaxed into the scene through your choice of sounds and activities for your characters, and spirits who do appear can be befriended and brought along for future sessions.
title: Make-Your-Own-Lofi-Girl Game Spirit City: Lofi Sessions Is Out Now
